title: Wanted - John Phenomenal Smith Old Judge Card
author: beckie43

posts.post_title: Wanted - John Phenomenal Smith Old Judge Card
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

I'm interested in purchasing a John Phenomenal Smith Old Judge card.  If anyone has one they are looking to sell please contact me.  

Or if you have any suggestions as to where I could search to obtain a John Phenomenal Smith card please let me know.  

Thank you in advance for your help.
I am glad you posted. Wasn't this player your great great grandfather?

It looks like Dave Levin has one.

[url]https://www.gfg.com/LLojfind/24.shtml[/url]

Keith O'Leary

Hi Leon...yes, he was my great, great grandfather.  My grandmother tells wonderful stories of him.  Unfortunately, we don't have his card in our memorabilia.  Plus, this is something I'd love to pass along to my son one day.  

Hi Keith...thanks for the lead to that site.  I'm going to check it out.  

I'll keep you all posted on my progress!  Thanks so much!

beckie :-)

Hey everyone...

I'm still in the market for a John Phenomenal Smith Old Judge card.  If anyone is looking to sell or has any other leads please let me know.  

Thanks in advance for yor help!
